feed.title: DockSTARTer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.08.02-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Clean up menu_app_select slightly by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2097
  • Add ds -S and ds --select commands to go directly to the app seleâ€¦ by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2098
  • Add templates to all temporary file names, showing app name, functionâ€¦ by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2099
  • Remove temp file when done using it in env_update by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2100
  • Rename the log temp file to DockSTARTer.log.XXXXXXXXXX by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2101
  • Change dialog --stdout to dialog --output-fd 1, and add `--no-triâ€¦ by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2102
  • Update the progress bar in menu_app_select, with progress and logging in separate windows on the screen by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2103

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.31-1...v2025.08.02-1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.08.02-2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Re-enabled the tput reset that I had temporarily disabled while debâ€¦ by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2104
  • Update the dialog options in menu_app_select to preserve all whitâ€¦ by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2105

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.08.02-1...v2025.08.02-2

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.08.06-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update app select, adding theming to the progress screen by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2106
  • Add missing Progress colors to Debian theme by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2107
  • Add missing end line by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2108
  • Move --select option below the env_create call by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2109
  • Sanitize application variable values as they are added by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2110
  • Add missing linefeed in notices for appvars_purge by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2111
  • Update the progress bar in menu_app_select by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2112

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.08.02-2...v2025.08.06-1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: 2025.08.08-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add a sanitize_path to remove ~ from paths, and use it in functions. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2113
  • fix(main.sh): ðŸ”§ set correct file permissions to prevent unintended checkout by @TommyE123 in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2115
  • Update the progress dialog screens in menu_app_select by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2116
  • Strip ANSI colors from the subtitles of dialog boxes by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2117
  • Split detecting installed apps in menu_app_select into four steps fâ€¦ by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2118
  • Only allow A-Z, a-z, 0-9, _ and in the status tags in theâ€¦ by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2119

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.08.06-1...2025.08.08-1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.08.08-2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(gitignore): ðŸ§¹ add new ignore patterns by @TommyE123 in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2114
  • Switch from using the DIALOGOPTS var to a temp file to store globalâ€¦ by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2120
  • Fix description of --list-nondeprecated in the usage text by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2121

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/2025.08.08-1...v2025.08.08-2
